Description:
PNJS101121 - 312055856
Suitable fire precautions are not in place such as automatic fire alarms.
 NJS16112101 - 312414469
you do not have the health and safety knowledge to fulfil your role as Principal Contractor in a way that secures the safety and health of persons affected by the project, such as contractors on site, as demonstrated by the lack of control of hazards such as work at height and fire safety which should be within the knowledge and experience of a competent principal contractor
